sections.text: a chance for M-class flares on days one, two, and three (31 Dec, 01 Jan, 02 Jan).

sections.title: Geophysical Activity Summary 29/2100Z to 30/2100Z: The geomagnetic
sections.text: field has been at quiet levels for the past 24 hours. Solar wind speed, as measured by the ACE spacecraft, reached a peak speed of 398 km/s at 30/0038Z. Total IMF reached 5 nT at 30/1819Z. The maximum southward component of Bz reached -4 nT at 29/2106Z. Electrons greater than 2 MeV at geosynchronous orbit reached a peak level of 1656 pfu.

sections.title: Geophysical Activity Forecast: The geomagnetic field is expected
sections.text: to be at unsettled to severe storm levels on day one (31 Dec), unsettled to minor storm levels on day two (01 Jan) and unsettled to active levels on day three (02 Jan). Protons have a slight chance of crossing threshold on days one, two, and three (31 Dec, 01 Jan, 02 Jan).

sections.text: field has been at quiet to major storm levels for the past 24 hours. Solar wind speed, as measured by the ACE spacecraft, reached a peak speed of 575 km/s at 31/0537Z.
